sub_title: Currently leading the Quality organisation at SMART Photonics, a Scale-Up Photonics foundry in the heart of European Photonics Research, Development and Industrialization.
summary:
Multi-Disciplinary Semiconductor & Lighting Industry Expert with stints in R&D/IC Layout, NPD/NPI, Yield Enhancement, Manufacturing, Quality, Product Engineering, Operations, Project Management, Product/Process Transfers, etc all over the world.
Holder of both US and EU citizenship. Familiar and cognizant of linguistic, cultural and environmental variances all over the world. A team player and an enthusiastic, optimistic leader. 

Presently leading the Quality and Processes management group of the newly formed Zumtobel Group Services division of Zumtobel lighting (www.zgservices.com).

Previously: Head of Quality and Processes management group of the newly formed Zumtobel Group Services division of Zumtobel lighting (www.zgservices.com).
 Sr. PQE at Dialog, Co-Founder and CTO of EU_LED. We are involved in the sales, services, design, and installation of Solid-State Lighting in Cyprus and abroad. We are involved in numerous projects regarding residential, commercial, industrial, outdoor and entertainment lighting applications.

I have 25 years of experience in the semiconductor/LED lighting industry. I possess a wide-ranging experience from Inception of Design, IC Layout and Design, New Product Qualification, ND char, testing, sustaining, yield enhancement, foundry comms, applications, and customer support, etc. At my former company, I was elected to the technical ladder in less than 2 years. Additionally, I received various awards and accolades for my cost-cutting techniques and customer disruption avoidance efforts which saved my company millions.

I feel that my experience and "big picture" way of looking at things can successfully translate to other industries as well. My experience with successfully helping customers when things for them were bleak (line down situations), enabled me to work with many groups within my company in order to proactively establish controls that ensured customers a great product.

Specialties: Quality Management, New Product Qualification, Yield Enhancement, Customer Support, Product Engineering, New Product Design and Characterization, Statistical Analysis

profile_positions.description: Leading manufacturers around the globe rely on ams’ sensing know-how for advanced systems design. For ams, “Sensing is Life” and our passion is in creating the sensor solutions that make devices smarter, safer, convenient and more environment-friendly. ams’ sensor solutions are at the heart of the products and technologies that define our world today
profile_positions.title: Sr. Manager PQE Group Austria

profile_positions.description:
Zumtobel Group makes some of the most advanced lighting in the world – ZGS is its new service offering.

From controls and connectivity to data collection and analysis, from software development to light as a service, from emergency lighting to life cycle management of lighting infrastructures – ZGS turns lighting into customised, scalable and ready-to-use solutions.

With ZGS, Zumtobel Group can offer the most comprehensive and specialist solutions in the lighting industry.
profile_positions.title: Head Of Quality Management and Processes, Zumtobel Group Services (zgs)

profile_positions.description: Product Qualification for Samsung smartphone PMIC and Audio ASICs. Project management of Fab process transfer from the Quality perspective. FMEA implementation.
profile_positions.title: Senior Product Quality Engineer

profile_positions.description:
SSL research for Lighting applications.
Intelligent Lighting Solutions for Retail, Residential, Commercial, Hospitality, Outdoor, Custom, Street & Parking etc. applications.
profile_positions.title: Founding Partner and CTO

profile_positions.description:
•	Leading multidisciplinary teams (Fab, Test, Quality, FA, etc.) for various issues. Main focus was cost reduction, yield and <1DPPM customer issues.
•      Cost reduction by identifying Fab, Laser Probe and Final Test inefficiencies and correcting them.
•	Responsible for Yield Enhancement of over 500 ICC and CIC devices from the Burr Brown High Precision Analog product line.
•	Responsible for Laser Probe Sustaining Eng. of over 100 CIC and ICC devices.
•	Process, Laser Probe and Final Test Yield integration.
•	Troubleshooting of Process issues that affect yields, quality, reliability.
•	Conversion of Legacy devices to the Eagle Tester system.
Improved Yields across the manufacturing chain resulting in millions of cost savings.
•	Worked with numerous international customers (Toshiba, Sony, Bosch, RIM, Samsung, etc.) rapidly resolving line down situations which resulted in considerable cost savings (millions of dollars).
•	Rapid correlation of root causes using dataPOWER and implementation of solutions by applying process fixes in Wafer Fab, Laser Probe or Final Test.
•	Initiating Yield Enhancement alerts when a device’s yield (in Fab, Laser Probe or Final Test) would fall. Depending on the fallout, various levels of alert would be initiated. Reports and action plans were presented and put in place.
•	In charge of qualifying process transfers from Foundries to TI Fabs.
•	Training other Engineers in data analysis using various tools and methods
profile_positions.title: Sr. Yield Enhancement Engineer member of Technical Staff

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible for characterizing MAXIM analog ICs from the inception of the design to the final test for production.
•	Responsible for communicating to the customers with any inquiries about the products and implementing them into systems.
•	Failure Analysis at the wafer level of unsuccessful Si revisions and implementation of Focused Ion Beam (FIB) solutions.
•	Responsible for manuscript, data sheet and ECN meetings for MAXIM Linear ICs.
•	Implementation of test solutions for MAXIM products.
•	Statistical Analysis of Characterization Data and normalization of parameter test data into the final test limits for production.
•	Design, layout and production of high speed and DC Evaluation PCBs.
•	Internal Quality Auditor for ISO9001 procedures.
•	Active Laser Trim and debugging of circuit on die or wafer using an Optical Laser Probe Station.
•	Design and simulation of active resistor ladder trim networks on die.
•	Database maintenance for all archived layouts and tape outs.
•	AC and DC Characterization of MAXIM high speed analog ICs.
•	Schematic capture and design of PCBs at discrete component level, prototyping and debugging of boards for characterization, test or customer evaluation.
profile_positions.title: Product Characterization Engineer
